output.sentences: The girl researched places to take her friend while out on a trip.
She found a nice resturaunt and wrapped up the gift card to the place for her birthday.
They resturant was an asian food place.
The chefs take a lot of pride in how they arrange their food.
The lady was very surprised and happy with her gift.
